title: [Large-scale] Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Development for Online Mathematics Education

context.additional_context: Mobile-based microlearning environment for current practitioners, utilizing personal devices via BYOD, with daily 15-20 minute learning sessions over one week

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute weekly learning plans using digital resources.
Learners can self-assess daily learning outcomes through mobile quizzes.
Learners can improve time management and motivation strategies by maintaining a learning journal.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
